profanity: What the hell do you mean?
I watched angrily as he swore at his friend.
I'm never going to do this shit again.

text: Awesome dog food. However, when given to my Boston, who has severe reactions to some food ingredients; his itching increased to violent jumping out of bed at night, scratching. As soon as I changed to a different formula, the scratching stopped. So glad Natural Balance has other choices. I guess you have to try each, until you find what's best for your pet.
